title: kaNNanai kaNDu (padam)
sahitya:
kaNNanai kaNDu kaLippadeppO sakhiyE karuttil pughunda kArmukhil vaNNanai


anupallavi

  eNNum pozhudinilE kaNmun varuvEn enrAn vaNNamAip-pEshi vArttai maranduviTTa


caraNam 1    punnai mara nizhalil pullAnguzhal UdiyE ennai mayanga vaittAn EmAtri shenriTTa
    caraNam 2    mullai shirippinilE mUzhgi enai marandEn mella nazhuvi viTTAn mINDum varAmarppOna
    caraNam 3    AruyirE enru Ashaiyura aNaittAn Anirai mEitta ambujapAdanai
